error.api_error: An error occurred in the pyemoncms API : {details}

migrate_database.description:
Your [emoncms]({url}) does not ship a unique identifier.

Please upgrade to at least version 11.5.7 and migrate your emoncms database.

More info in the [emoncms documentation]({doc_url})
migrate_database.title: Upgrade your emoncms version

remove_value_template.description:
Configuring {domain} using YAML is being removed and the `{parameter}` parameter cannot be imported.

Please remove `{parameter}` from your `{domain}` yaml configuration and restart Home Assistant

Alternatively, you may entirely remove the `{domain}` configuration from your configuration.yaml, restart Home Assistant, and add the {domain} integration manually.

error.api_error: An error occurred in the pyemoncms API : {details}
